A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Visually\, Star wars the last jedi is a very beautiful movie. Multiple scenes from the show are beautiful and I could easily frame it. For this reason\, I give this movie 2 stars.

As far as story\, watching this movie felt like watching game of thrones but instead of being directed by someone that wants to show the gruesomeness of war and treason\, it's being directed by a sissy who doesn't want to kill their favorite character. Teases the audience with "Oh look\, character 1 is dead\, HAH! JUST KIDDING!"

In star wars 7\, we had an important death that basically meant "Look\, anyone can die".

In Star wars 8\, we see multiple "They're dead" moments but nope! Still alive! This removes completely the threat of death.
